articles.title: DryMerge promises to connect apps that normally don't talk to each other — and when it works, it's great - TechCrunch
articles.description: DryMerge, a Y Combinator-backed startup, is building a platform that taps AI to generate automation workflows across different apps.
articles.content: Platforms to connect apps that wouldn’t normally talk to each other have been around for a minute (see: Zapier). But they have not gotten dramatically simpler to use if you’re nontechnical. Generativ… [+5755 chars]

articles.title: The Magnificent Seven is less expensive. Buying these tech giants now could pay off - Fortune
